issue.title: [CF 121] Overpower/Revenge show in diffrent stance
issue.body:
Any way for icons to show when Overpower and Revenge is available while in Berserker stance?


> Posted by CurseForge user ParasiteXX | Imported from CurseForge issue #121 | Raw

comments.body:
Interesting way to make a feature request, but OK.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
